review: Very co-operative Doctor. Suggests **** treatment. Very patient with procedures. Definitely recommend.

I had visited for tooth ache. The doctor was professional and explained the root canal process. The process was completely painless and doctor took all the Corona precautions and also wore a PPE kit. Recommended.
Clean and hygienic Clinic... Doctor is very polite and patient in listening to problems and providing right and reasonable solution... Did my root canal and cap fixing... Satisfied.
I recently got cleaning and polishing of my teeth done. The results are really good and I am happy with the treatment.

I have taken root canal treatment under Dr Pratiksha Tiwari and I must appreciate the way she treats. She's soft spoken, never suggests unnecessarily heavy treatments and also I must say that I had never seen dentist like her who does her work so softly, carefully.  It was not at all painful.  Great experience!

I m happy with my dental treatment , recently went to clinic for my wisdom  tooth  pain , I want to remove , though dr explain mi   about  root canal treatment in single sitting,but I want to remove it as soon as possible becoz of pain, she is soft spoken, well  explain  mi about  rct and saving the tooth ,I'm so happy with treatment , thank you to save my tooth
The dentist was very polite and gave me proper knowledge about the procedure. I underwent a root canal and the rates were quite reasonable. Will definitely recommend.
